name: Skin Perfecting 2% BHA Liquid Exfoliant
about: What it is: Best-selling leave-on exfoliant with 2% salicylic acid & green tea is clinically proven to unclog pores & control oil for clearer skin in 1 week...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily..Skincare Concerns: Pores, Uneven Texture, and Acne and Blemishes..Formulation: Liquid..Highlighted Ingredients:.- BHA (Beta Hydroxy Acid)%: Penetrates pores to clear blemish-causing buildup and shed dead skin..- Green Tea Extract:  A potent antioxidant quickly calms redness & soothes skin barrier..- Methylpropanediol: Hydrates & prevents water loss while visibly improving skinu2019s glow...Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, and triclosan. It is also gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: This gentle leave-on exfoliant works within the pore lining to prevent congestion & blemishes. 2% BHA is clinically proven to visibly reduce pores, control oil & support skinu2019s barrier. Exfoliation helps the rest of your routine absorb better and work harder for a glowing, makeup-ready complexion...Clinical Results: Based on an independent clinical study with 11 subjects after 1 week:.- 90% had visibly reduced blackheads in 1 week.- 100% had visibly reduced whiteheads in 1 week.
ingredients: -Salicylic Acid (BHA) 2%: Penetrates pores to clear blemish-causing buildup and shed dead skin..-Green Tea: A potent antioxidant that soothes irritated skin while improving visible signs of aging..-Methylpropanediol: Hydrates while visibly enhancing the skinu2019s glow and the formulau2019s penetration....Water (Aqua), Methylpropanediol, Butylene Glycol, Salicylic Acid, Polysorbate 20, Camellia Oleifera (Green Tea) Leaf Extract, Sodium Hydroxide, Tetrasodium EDTA.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply once or twice daily after cleansing and toning..-Gently shake 1u20132x onto hands or a cotton pad. .-Apply to face and neck (avoid contact with your lash line and eyelids)..-Do not rinse..-Follow with serum and/or moisturizer..-For daytime wear, always finish with SPF 30+....Start Slowly: Apply every other day and note skin's response. Then use up to twice daily. For daytime, always finish with SPF 30+. For nighttime, follow with the rest of your routine. If you have a salicylate allergy, check with your physician before using any products that contain salicylic acid.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this product after I began experiencing more clogged pores than usual during the summer months, which is typical for me. I also wanted to experience the glowing skin many people claimed this product gave them. I bought this with the intention that I would experience some purging to clear my clogged pores. I was not prepared for this to make my entire face purge in red, painful breakouts that took weeks to heal. I even started out by gradually incorporating this by using it once to twice a week because I know that this formula is super concentrated. I continued to use this product for over a month in the hopes that the purging was normal and it would eventually go away, but it was a never-ending cycle of continuous painful, red breakouts and irritation. I only gave two stars because it gave my skin a good initial glow when first applied. I finally stopped using it and switched to an EWG verified skincare brand that has drastically helped repair the damage this product caused me. I went in with very high hopes expecting the purge, but please, please be careful trying this if you are prone to breakouts. (Attached below is my skin before and after using this product.)

In a little over a WEEK, my jaw acne was 80% gone, with only a bit of texture being felt to the touch, and my enlarged T-zone pores were almost invisible. ITu2019S MAGIC! In addition, some dark spots and teensy pimples I had on my cheeks were practically gone. I will say that it can be drying especially around the ala region of the nose, so keep that in mind!   Definitely adding the full sized bottle to my cart the next time I visit Sephora!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I started using this product as part of my skincare routine to treat my breakouts and OH MY GOD it's perfect for me. It's so smooth and easy to apply, and leaves my skin with a radiant and dewy finish. I use it 6 days a week, and my acne has been so much better since. It cleared up so quick within the first week, and my skin is a lot less oily now that I've added it to my consistent routine. It can dry out your skin though, so I always use moisturizer right after. The product is quite runnyu2014it has the consistency of water, so I recommend using a makeup pad or applying a little on your fingers and dabbing it out. Overall, I love this product. It has helped me even my skin tone and clear up my acneu2014I definitely recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Five years ago I asked a girlfriend with great skin how to get great skin for my wedding. This was top of her list.  The standout feature of this exfoliant is its ability to slough off dead skin and excess sebum safely and without irritation. It's particularly impressive how it's helped me navigate the hormonal shifts of perimenopause, which have brought all kinds of fun changes to my skin. The salicylic acid works wonders for keeping pores clear and minimizing breakouts.  In winter, when my skin tends to be drier, I use it up to twice a day. During summer, I typically scale back to every other day, and it still maintains its effectiveness.  Hot tip: Apply it directly with fingers onto clean skin. This will help you use less product -- only about 4 drops per application -- and avoid adding cotton pads to the landfill.

reviews.review_title: Worked wonders on my clogged pores!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using Paula's Choice 2% BHA Liquid Exfoliant for a few weeks now, and it has truly transformed my skin. As someone with acne-prone, congested skin, Iu2019ve always struggled with clogged pores, especially around my T-zone. After incorporating this exfoliant into my routine, I started to notice a significant difference in both the texture and clarity of my skin.  The salicylic acid in the formula works deep within my pores, gently exfoliating from the inside out. Iu2019ve seen fewer blackheads, and the overall congestion has reduced dramatically. My skin feels smoother and looks more refined, with a noticeable decrease in breakouts. It's also lightweight and absorbs quickly, making it easy to layer with the rest of my skincare routine.  Overall, this product has been a game-changer for keeping my pores clear and my skin balanced. Highly recommend for anyone dealing with similar issues!

This product is 2% BHA and contains salicylic acid. It helps to unclog pores, shrink enlarged pores, smooth and even tone.  You start by using this every other day, and can work up to twice a day. After a week of using this product, I am HOOKED. My overall skin is SO smooth! No rough bumpy skin, no little breakouts. My pores, which I have a horrible time with, look smaller, and itu2019s even helped with blackheads too.  My makeup goes on so smoothly now and my face always feels so soft and smooth. I absolutely love the results Iu2019ve gotten within a week and will definitely be adding this to my routine! Itu2019s a need!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Paula's Choice Skin Perfecting 2% BHA Liquid Exfoliant is a popular skincare product known for improving skin texture and tone. Here are  benefits of this product:  1. **Active Ingredient**: The exfoliant contains salicylic acid which penetrates deep into the pores to help remove dead skin cells, excess oil, and debris.  2. **Exfoliation**: It helps to exfoliate the skin's surface, promoting cell turnover and revealing smoother, brighter skin underneath. This can be particularly beneficial for those with acne-prone or oily skin.  3. **Pore Cleansing**: The BHA in this formulation is oil-soluble, allowing it to effectively unclog pores and reduce the appearance of blackheads and whiteheads.  4. **Anti-Inflammatory Properties**: Salicylic acid also has anti-inflammatory properties, making it suitable for those with sensitive or acne-prone skin.  5. **Non-Irritating**: It is often praised for being gentle on the skin, suitable for daily use for many skin types, including combination and oily skin.  6. **Application**: The product is typically applied after cleansing and can be used in the morning or evening. It's important to follow up with sunscreen during the day, as exfoliation can increase sun sensitivity.  7. **Results**: Users often report improvements in skin texture, reduced breakouts, and a more even skin tone with regular use.

I do believe this product is worth the price and Iu2019ve decided to make add it to my skincare routine along with my other Paulau2019s Choice products plus the obligatory necessary sunscreen!!

Overall, Paulau2019s Choice 2% BHA Liquid Exfoliant lives up to its reputation, making it a fantastic addition to your skincare routine. I would recommend only using it once weekly, as it may irritate your skin, if used more often.

The liquid exfoliant is lightweight and absorbs quickly, leaving no sticky residue. It effectively unclogs pores and reduces blackheads, giving my skin a much smoother texture. One of the standout features is its ability to reduce redness and even out my skin tone. I've noticed a significant decrease in breakouts, and my complexion looks brighter and more radiant. The 2% salicylic acid works wonders without causing any irritation, which is a big plus for my sensitive skin. Overall, I highly recommend this product to anyone struggling with acne, blackheads, or uneven skin texture. It's a game-changer and definitely worth the investment. You can find it at Sephora, and it's a staple in my skincare routine now!

If you're looking for something to refine your skin and give it a healthy glow, I definitely recommend giving this a try! Just remember to start slowly and always use sunscreen during the day.

reviews.review_text: Sure! Hereu2019s a shorter version without headlines:  ---  I've always been on the lookout for the perfect skincare product to tackle my combination skin, blackheads, and occasional breakouts. After hearing rave reviews, I decided to try Paula's Choice Skin Perfecting 2% BHA Liquid Exfoliant, and it has been a game-changer.  The sleek, minimalist packaging caught my eye, and the liquid formula is lightweight and absorbs quickly without leaving any greasy residue. I started using it every other night, applying a small amount to a cotton pad and swiping it over my clean, dry face. Thereu2019s a slight tingling sensation initially, but it quickly subsides.  After just a few weeks, I noticed significant improvements: fewer blackheads, smaller pores, smoother texture, and a more even complexion. My occasional breakouts were less frequent and healed faster. Now, after a few months, my skin has never looked better. I receive compliments on my clear, glowing skin regularly.  Paula's Choice Skin Perfecting 2% BHA Liquid Exfoliant is a must-have for anyone struggling with blackheads or uneven skin texture. Itu2019s gentle enough for regular use yet highly effective. If youu2019re hesitant about chemical exfoliants, give this one a try. Itu2019s truly a skincare hero in a bottle!
5 stars. Canu2019t believe it stops oils and pimples in a week. Skin is clear and not dried out.

The big bottle lasts a while, Iu2019ve had my bottle for a year and still havenu2019t finished it. Make sure you only use this 1 or 2 times a week when you first start using it. reviews.review_text: @manazeffects Paula's Choice Exfoliation : 2% BHA Liquid. Get glowing beautiful skin with this skin perfecting formula. The cult-favorite 2% BHA seriously unclogs my pores and is an extra gentle BHA to resurface texture and tone. My skin looks visible smoother, decreased breakouts . The BHA helps to clear & minimize enlarged pores. 2% BHA (beta hydroxy acid) sheds built-up layers of skin for smooth, even tone complexion. The formula is ightweight liquid exfoliating serum/treatment that absorbs quickly into skin. Love it and highly recommend.   Highlighted Ingredients: - Salicylic Acid: Unclogs and visibly minimizes pores.  Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also gluten-free and cruelty-free.   HOW TO USE To use separately: After cleansing and toning, gently apply AHA using fingers or a cotton pad over entire face and neck. I love to use my fingertips. -Avoid direct contact with eyes and lips.  - Do not rinse.  - For daytime, always finish with SPF 30+. For nighttime, follow with the rest of your routine.  -Start slowly: Apply every other day and note skin's response.

reviews.review_text: I have been using Paula's Choice BHA Exfoliant for years, well before it was even available in Canada, and I can't say enough good things about it! I have mild rosacea in my cheek area, and I love that these products don't irritate my skin at all.  Pros: Gentle Exfoliation: Mandelic acid is less irritating, ideal for sensitive skin. Improved Texture: Regular use has left my skin noticeably smoother and brighter. Hydrating: Lactic acid helps retain moisture, preventing dryness.  Cons: Mild Tingling: Some users may experience slight tingling upon application. Sun Sensitivity: As with all AHAs, sunscreen is a must during the day.  Overall, this liquid exfoliant is perfect for those looking to refine their skin effectively without any irritation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I recently had the opportunity to try Paula's Choice CA Exfoliation Experience Kit, and I am thoroughly impressed with the results. Using natural lighting, I took before and after pictures over a one-use period. The transformation was remarkable. My skin's clarity improved significantly, with a noticeable reduction in discoloration. Pores appeared less prominent, and my overall complexion became more even and radiant. One of the standout benefits was the enhancement in my skin's luminosity and tone. The combination of Salicylic Acid, Mandelic Acid, and Lactic Acid worked to deliver a glow. My skin not only looked brighter but also felt incredibly smooth and soft. Incorporating both products into my skincare routine was seamless. I started as recommended, using the AHA every 2u20133 days and the BHA on alternate days. Eventually, I progressed to using them daily, with BHA in the morning and AHA at night. This method ensured gentle yet effective exfoliation without irritation. I have recently cut down to one use per week. The overall health of my skin improved noticeably. It felt more resilient and balanced. The products are free from parabens, formaldehydes, phthalates, and other harmful ingredients, making them suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin like mine. Additionally, the gluten-free and cruelty-free formulations are a bonus for those with specific lifestyle preferences. The Paula's Choice CA Exfoliation Experience Kit is a game-changer for anyone looking to improve their skin's clarity, luminosity, and overall health. Its gentle yet effective formulation makes it a must-try, and I highly recommend it. This kit delivers on its promise of multi-level glow and is a worthy addition to any skincare regimen.

reviews.review_text: The  Duo Exfoliating Experience from Paulau2019s Choice Skincare.  This powerful, yet gentle skin perfecting duo are liquid leave-on exfoliators used in a routine together and hereu2019s what theyu2019re about. I found both to be light weight and easy to apply. For my skin, which is very sensitive, I found starting out with application every other day to be a little much. If you also have very sensitive skin you may want to start with 2-3 times a week at first to see how your skin reacts. After just one and half weeks the inflammation in my skin improved and the redness has started to calm and dissipate. The dryness in my skin has flaked off leaving a smoother, brighter tone. Overall, great products if you have acne, blackheads, clogged pores or fine lines.

reviews.review_text: Recently tried Paula's Choice Skin Perfecting 2% BHA Liquid Exfoliant, and let me tell you, it's been a game-changer for my combo skin. After using it for a few weeks, my skin definitely feels smoother and my pores appear smaller. Plus, it doesn't feel drying or irritating at all.  Now, I have oily skin that can handle a bit more punch, but if you have sensitive skin, you might want to ease into using this product. It can be a little strong at first. Also, since it has BHA, sunscreen is a non-negotiable! But overall, I'm super impressed with this liquid exfoliator and would definitely recommend it if you're looking to banish clogged pores and achieve a smoother, brighter complexion.

reviews.review_text: I am thrilled to share my experience with Paula's Choice Skin Perfecting 2% BHA Liquid Exfoliant. From the first application, I noticed a remarkable difference in my skin's texture and clarity. The 2% salicylic acid works wonders in gently exfoliating without causing irritation, which is crucial for my sensitive, pigment-rich skin. Over time, it has significantly reduced the appearance of my hyperpigmentation and post-inflammatory dark spots, giving my complexion a more even tone and radiant glow.  One of the standout benefits of this product is its ability to minimize the appearance of pores and control excess oil without stripping my skin of its natural moisture. Itu2019s lightweight and absorbs quickly, making it a perfect addition to both my morning and nighttime skincare routines. I also appreciate that itu2019s fragrance-free, which minimizes the risk of any adverse reactions.  Overall, Paula's Choice Skin Perfecting 2% BHA Liquid Exfoliant has become an indispensable part of my skincare arsenal. Itu2019s a game-changer for anyone with melanated skin looking to achieve smoother, clearer, and more even-toned skin. I highly recommend it! I uploaded then vs now photos

reviews.review_text: Itu2019s funny to see the successful rebranding that salicylic acid has undergone. BHA is an umbrella term for beta-hydroxy acids, and the one used here is 2% salicylic, the same concentration of the same acid used in the Stridex acne pads of my youth. The acid here is no gentler, but there arenu2019t added fragrances or rough textured pads, so this experience is a little more refined. I apply it all over my face with a soft cotton round, then dot a little extra onto problem areas (the sides of my nose and any breakouts) with my fingers. It doesnu2019t irritate my skin and provides gentle exfoliation to give me a more even complexion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received a small foil packet sample of the Paula's Choice 2% BHA Liquid Exfoliant to try. After cleansing & toning during my nighttime skincare regime, I applied a small amount of the exfoliant to a cotton round. I used the product again the next morning and evening. Before and after photos are so important when it comes to showing results with skincare products. By simply looking at my face I couldn't detect much change. After putting my before and after pictures up of my nose side by side I could see improvement. I was surprised to see a noticeable change. The pores on my nose appeared to be smaller.My skin appeared to have a more even skin tone with less redness.The surface of my skin looked glowy/shiny and smooth.I got to see for myself why this is a top global seller. Even with the short amount of time that I used the product.It helps to minimize pores,gets rid of dead skin cells,evens out the skin tone,minimizes wrinkles, and redness.Plus,the green tea soothes and supports your skin barrier.Glad that I had a chance to see this work on my skin for myself.I will certainly purchase when the need arises.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: If you struggle with clogged pores, blackheads, or just dull, uneven skin, this stuff is your new best friend. I'd heard rave reviews about this product for ages and finally decided to give it a go u2013 it's absolutely lived up to the hype!  The star ingredient is 2% BHA (salicylic acid), which dissolves the gunk inside your pores and gently sloughs away dead skin. It sounds harsh, but surprisingly, it's incredibly gentle on my skin. Plus, there's green tea in there to soothe any potential irritation.  After a few weeks, my pores look visibly smaller, those pesky blackheads are less noticeable, and my overall skin tone looks brighter and smoother. The texture is like water, so it absorbs instantly and layers beautifully under anything else I use. Honestly, if you're looking for an effective yet gentle way to transform your skin, Paula's Choice 2% BHA Liquid Exfoliant is a no-brainer. It's a cult classic for good reason!

I started out using it every other night just to see how my skin would react. The word exfoliant made me a bit scared because I have sensitive, oily, acne-prone skin. I was pleasantly surprised by how gentle this product is! I didn't encounter any stinging or burning or dryness, so I have now been using it every night before bed, followed by a hydrating serum. This has almost cleared my skin in just one week. My active break outs have almost completely subsided, my skin is visibly smoother and less red. Usually I deal with stubborn redness after a break out, but my complexion looks so even already! Also, my skin feels less oily after a long day. I'm going to keep using this and hope I continue to see these results but so far so GREAT!! I'm giving it 4 rather than 5 stars because I will say, I don't LOVE the smell of it. It's a bit funky. But it's worth it for how well it's working so far. I would definitely recommend this.

My skin isnu2019t sensitive and never breaks out like this when trying a new product. I canu2019t imagine if I was acne-prone how much worse my skin would have reacted. The only positive is that the pores on my nose are maybe smaller but I honestly canu2019t tell if it was just the layer of pilling product on my skin. I donu2019t recommend this product.

reviews.review_title: I had high expectations but was disappointed :(
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got this product after hearing people RAVE about it. I had very high expectations as someone who struggles with comedonal acne (blackheads, small bumps on forehead, mainly under-the-skin annoying bumps). I decided to give the mini a try (I didn't want to spend almost $40 on a product that might not be the best for me!) However I was disappointed. I tried this product for several weeks without seeing a difference in my skin. Maybe it works for some people, but for a teen with comedonal acne, normal/dry skin type, and high expectations, it just disappointed me. My advice: you can give it a try (the mini is $13, it's not a splurge) if you want to, but keep in mind that it may not work for you. After all everyone's skin is different, and one product can't satisfy the needs of everyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product. I had mild acne (clogged pores and whiteheads) for years; I tried salicylic acid face washes and two cheaper brands of salicylic acid serum, but nothing works as well as this. I finally got clear skin! You only need a few drops at a time, so a bottle lasts for months - it's a great value. When I first started using it daily I had some very slight dryness, but nothing serious. Just moisturize well and use it every other day. My skin adjusted and now I use it every day with zero issues. The product itself also feels moisturizing, unlike other brands of drying alcohol-based toners. I did not have any irritation. I don't have particularly sensitive skin but my sister does and she uses this too with no problems. It has a faint medicinal scent but once it's on I don't even notice. Overall, I can't recommend this highly enough to help keep your pores clear and your skin feeling fresh!

Within 3 days of use, I saw immediate improvement in texture and scarring pigmentation. I didnu2019t even develop a couple pimples like I usually do right before my cycle. I havenu2019t had hormonal acne in some time, but Iu2019ve received a lot of compliments from friends that my skin looks clearer than ever. Iu2019m super satisfied with this product and will definitely continue to use as part of my staple routine.
